# Description 

This markdown document contains the code to reproduce visualizations of the synthesized data set used in the technical documentation. 

## Set up

```{r label = "read in packages"}
library(tidyverse)
library(mapsf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(paletteer)
library(rasterVis)
```

```{r label = "read in data"}
setwd("/capstone/kelpgeomod/old_file_structure/")


# read in AOI shape
aoi <- read_sf("raw_data/New_AOI_SBchannel_shp/New_AOI_SBchannel.shp")

# read in land bounds
land <- read_sf("raw_data/land_bounds/California_County_Boundaries/cnty19_1.shp") |> 
  st_union() |> # gets rid of the county lines
  st_transform("EPSG:4326") |> 
  st_crop(aoi)

# read in observed synthesized data for visualization
observed_syn <- read_csv("analysis_data/synthesized/observed-nutrients-synthesized.csv") |> 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = st_crs(4326)) |> 
  filter(nutrient_source != "lter_nitrate")

# Year and quarter raster stacks of nitrogen (nitrate + nitrite), ammonium, and phospahte. 
nitrogen <- brick("intermediate_data/joined_nutrients/nitrate_nitrite_raster.tif")
ammonium <- brick("intermediate_data/joined_nutrients/ammonium_raster.tif")
phosphate <- brick("intermediate_data/joined_nutrients/phosphate_raster.tif")

# Read in interpolated nutrient layers for nitrogen 
n_interp <- brick("analysis_data/inteprolate_idw/nitrate_nitrite_quarterly.tif")
p_interp <- brick("analysis_data/inteprolate_idw/phosphate_quarterly.tif")
a_interp <- brick("analysis_data/inteprolate_idw/ammonium_quarterly.tif")

# read in kelp area and biomass
kelp_area <- brick("intermediate_data/area_biomass/area_brick_standardized.tif")
kelp_bio <- brick("intermediate_data/area_biomass/biomass_brick_standardized.tif")

# read in substrate file 
reclass_table <- cbind(c(0, 1, 2, 3), c("soft", "hard", "mixed", "anthropogenic"))


substrate <- raster("intermediate_data/substrate/SBC_substrate.tif") 

test <- raster("raw_data/Benthic_Habitat_2/Habitat_tiffs/Channel_Islands/Santa_Cruz/gi_5msub.tif")

plot(test)
```

## Visualize the point data contained in the observed syntehsized data set

```{r label = "observed map"}

# create map
observed_map <- tm_shape(observed_syn) +
  tm_dots(col = "nutrient_source", 
          palette = paletteer_d("ggthemes::excel_Badge"), 
          title = "Nutrient Source", 
          size = 0.05, 
          alpha = 0.7,
          legend.show = FALSE) +
  tm_shape(land) +
  tm_polygons(col = "#EFE2C9") +
  tm_add_legend(type = "symbol", 
                col = paletteer_d("ggthemes::excel_Badge", 4),
                alpha = 0.7,
                labels = c("CalCOFI", 
                           "SBC LTER Bottle", 
                           "Plumes and Blooms", 
                           "USGS"), 
                title = "Nutrient Observation Source") +
  tm_layout(legend.outside = T, 
            legend.outside.size = 0.4)

observed_map
```


## Nitrogen

```{r label = "year/quarter nutrient viz"}
# Create representative map for each nutrient in the year/ quarter raster stacks.

red_pal <- c("#ff6700", "#db4200", "#bf3000", "#a11000", "#850000", "#550000")

nitrogen_map <- tm_shape(aoi) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_shape(land) +
  tm_polygons(col = "#EFE2C9") +
  tm_shape(nitrogen[[6]]) +
  tm_raster(legend.show = FALSE, palette = red_pal) +
  tm_layout(frame = FALSE)

nitrogen_map
```

```{r label = "nitrogen interp viz"}
nitrogen_interp_map_1 <- tm_shape(aoi) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_shape(land) +
  tm_polygons(col = "#EFE2C9") +
  tm_shape(n_interp[[1]]) +
  tm_raster(legend.show = T,
            title = "nitrogen concentration \n(micromoles per L)",
            breaks = c(0,3,6,9,12,20), 
            palette = red_pal) +
  tm_layout(frame = FALSE,
            legend.width = 1,
            legend.title.size = 1)

nitrogen_interp_map_1

nitrogen_interp_map_2 <- tm_shape(aoi) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_shape(land) +
  tm_polygons(col = "#EFE2C9") +
  tm_shape(n_interp[[2]]) +
  tm_raster(legend.show = F, 
            breaks = c(0,3,6,9,12,20),
            palette = red_pal) +
  tm_layout(frame = FALSE)

nitrogen_interp_map_2

nitrogen_interp_map_3 <- tm_shape(aoi) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_shape(land) +
  tm_polygons(col = "#EFE2C9") +
  tm_shape(n_interp[[3]]) +
  tm_raster(legend.show = F, breaks = c(0,3,6,9,12,20), 
            palette = red_pal) +
  tm_layout(frame = FALSE)

nitrogen_interp_map_3

nitrogen_interp_map_4 <- tm_shape(aoi) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_shape(land) +
  tm_polygons(col = "#EFE2C9") +
  tm_shape(n_interp[[4]]) +
  tm_raster(legend.show = F, 
            breaks = c(0,3,6,9,12,20), 
            palette = red_pal) +
  tm_layout(frame = FALSE)

nitrogen_interp_map_4
```
